com.morzeux.bioseclogger

Class CreateTemplateActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.morzeux.bioseclogger.CreateTemplateActivity

  • public class CreateTemplateActivity
extends Activity
    Activity simulates registration process. User is tasked to enter password several times and biometric template is creating during registration process.
    Author:
    Stefan Smihla
